name: Spongebob Horror 2.0
description:
Story:

SpongeBob has stayed up until 3 am to close the Krusty Krab. But Plankton has snuck into the restaurant and plans to steal the secret formula. You must finish all your tasks and then escape from the crunchy crustacean.

Spongebob Horror 2.0 is a remake of an old game i made. Play this game and not the old one
